name: interdepend
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of two or more things) to depend on each other: When things interdepend, a problem in one part can really mess up the others. the interdepending bonds of family life Related word
interdependent
More examplesFewer examplesLao-Tse's philosophy states that being and non-being interdepend.The obligations of the people who have made an agreement interdepend in a characteristic way.The work involves an expert unravelling and unfolding of an entanglement of competing and interdepending historical discourses.
